text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: They called it the Derby with the<n>greatest racers of all time.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
Among such amazing runners, no one<n>thought of her as
special.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: But she knew who she was.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
To leave her past defeats behind, she<n>unleashed all her
being into the final<n>sprint and, in a burst of blinding light,<n>
stood victorious at the finish.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: That light had a nameâ€”Eishin Flash.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
The strongest are always those who<n>believe in themselves
and follow their<n>own path.

For Winning Ticket, the first race of<n>the Classics, the Satsuki
Sho, ends in<n>failure.
The day after her defeat...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Phew...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: What was next, incline training?

She's training like any other day,<n>though I told her it's okay
to rest right<n>after a race.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, I'm fine.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
You know, I kinda feel like I can't<n>take a break, even for a
day... Ehehe.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: So I'm gonna get on with incline<n>training!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
She always lets her feelings take the<n>wheel, so I thought
she'd be all like,<n>"Nooo, I lost!"

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
But she doesn't seem to have her<n>normal boundless
energy. Losing the<n>Satsuki Sho must've been a<n>
tremendous shock.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Cause it means she could lose the<n>Derby next.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer, make sure to keep an eye on<n>her please.

I say that, but I have no idea what to<n>do for Winning Ticket
right now.
I go back to my office after training to<n>find her in there.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Did you forget something?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: No, just thought I'd watch a racing<n>video.

She's watching another Derby video.<n>She comes here to do
that pretty often.

But before, she would always get<n>choked up and start
yelling about how<n>emotional it is. This time she's just<n>
sitting here quiet as a mouse.
choice_data_list: Next it'll be your turn to race in the Derby.
Next it'll be your turn to race in the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Wha?! O-oh, right... Yeah. I'll be in the<n>race I've been
watching since<n>forever.

Usually she can't calm down once<n>she starts talking about
the Derby, but<n>she seems uneasy about something<n>today.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry we didn't win the Satsuki<n>Sho...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry we didn't win the Satsuki<n>Sho...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Um, Trainer? Can I say something<n>pretty obvious?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Like what?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: In racing, there's times when you<n>lose, huh?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
That's true, but we work hard so that<n>doesn't happen,
right?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
That's true, but we work hard so that<n>doesn't happen,
right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but I tried my hardest in the<n>Satsuki Sho. I did
everything I could<n>have.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Still... it wasn't enough. I feel like I<n>finally understand how
hard racing<n>really is.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
So now the videos I was always so<n>excited to watch... It's
like they've<n>turned into something else.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I used to see the racers who lost and<n>get all worked up like
it was some big<n>theater performance.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But I had no idea what they were<n>really feeling. How it felt
when their<n>dreams were shattered...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, ha ha... Guess I'm a little on edge!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Welp, I'd better get back soon or the<n>dorm head will get
pretty mad! See<n>you tomorrow!

She's gone, and the room falls silent<n>except for the sound
of the Derby<n>video still playing.
